title: IP boost
body: I'm knew to League Of Leagends what is an IP boost

replies.body: Welcome to the game, friend!  An IP Boost can be purchased to increase the amount of IP you earn in a match for a limited period.  You can then use your earned IP to unlocked runes or Champions!  We also have a an [IP Breakdown](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824-Reward-IP-XP-System-Breakdown) guide with more info.  I hope that helps clear things up, and best of luck in your games!
